items.title: Justin Yarbrough talks about alt text
items.desc: Justin discusses the importance of using alt text and thinking outside of our own use case.

items.title: Justin Yarbrough talks about form validation and screen readers
items.desc: Justin talks about the importance of providing clear and concise error messages within form validation and the best form validation patterns for screen reader users.

items.title: Boarding Pass 013: Airline Accessibility
items.desc: Justin discusses the accessible seat-back entertainment system United is starting to roll out on aircraft and the US Department of Transportation's proposed changes to regulations surrounding flying with a service animal.

items.title: Boarding Pass 029: Where did my Dog Drop a Nugget?
items.desc: Justin discusses his Runway Girl article about flying as a blind passenger during the early days of the pandemic and other aviation-related topics.

items.title: Boarding Pass 059: Dogs on a Plane
items.desc: Justin discusses the new US Department of Transportation regulations surrounding flying with a service animal on the eve of their going into effect.

items.title: #10 Mountain Goating in Dublin
items.desc: Justin and his wife Jen talk about their travels, including the challenges associated with traveling as a blind person.

items.title: Episode 115 - Axe-Con 2023 Is Here, Get To Know Deque Systems Justin Yarbrough
items.desc: Justin speaks with Brian and Ed about his panel for axe-con 2023, his work in accessibility, and a plethora of other blindness and accessibility-related topics.

items.title: Episode 6 - Justin Yarbrough, Digital Accessibility Specialist
items.desc: Justin discusses his work in digital accessibility at a community college.
